name: Imaginate YAY!
description: Imaginate YAY! : Where neurodiverse young adults (18-22) embark on a journey of arts exploration, mentorship, and professional development. Hours: Choose between two time slots: - 9 am - 12 pm - 1 pm - 4 pm You must stick with the chosen time slot for the whole semester
fullDescription: Imaginate YAY! : Where neurodiverse young adults (18-22) embark on a journey of arts exploration, mentorship, and professional development. Hours: Choose between two time slots: - 9 am - 12 pm - 1 pm - 4 pm You must stick with the chosen time slot for the whole semester
whatTheyOffer: Imaginate YAY! : Where neurodiverse young adults (18-22) embark on a journey of arts exploration, mentorship, and professional development. Hours: Choose between two time slots: - 9 am - 12 pm - 1 pm - 4 pm You must stick with the chosen time slot for the whole semester
howToGetIt: Apply using ONLINE FORM For more information and any questions about the program, please contact eleanorschiffler@creativityexplored.org
address: One Arkansas Street (at 16th Street), San Francisco, CA, 94107
